choices: Kung Fu Rescue!
(backup) I don't know kung fu!
Ignore her. Someone's bound to help soon, and you don't want to get knifed.
Run away as fast as you can!
Yell at the bad guys. Maybe they'll go away.
1.content:
You're walking along, minding your own business (as most adventures seem to begin with), when you suddenly see a damsel in distress.

"Save me!" she cries. She is being mugged by a pair of men in black tights. They would seem rather ludicrous if it weren't for the menacing weapons they hold. Ugly is gripping a knife, and Ugly (the other one) is pointing a gun at her temple. At her cry for help, he prods her sharply with the barrel and tells her to shut up. His voice is rough and gravelly.
1.title: The beginning of the end

choices: Virtue is its own reward! Haha, just kidding, what do you want to give me?
Virtue is its own reward! (I always wanted to say that)
I don't know, anything!
Money. LOTS OF IT! 8D
Surprise me, and make it good. I still have Ugly here's gun.
11.content:
You spin rapidly, relying on your training to carry you into the head of your knife-toting foe. Your kick is slightly off target, but that's okay. As long as he gets knocked unconscious, you won't have to worry about him.

The next guy was forewarned about your skill from the fate of The Other Ugly, and he manages to avoid most of your attacks with his gun at your throat. It seems a skirmish that is about to go in Ugly's favor, but the girl sneaks up behind him, motioning for you to be quiet.

"You thought you'd interfere, eh? Well, you came outta the wrong side o' this, pal..." He got no farther. With a great crash, the purse he'd been trying to nab hit his head and gave him a quick KO. The girl's green eyes stare into your own.

"Thank you," she says, "that was frightening. Is there anything I can give you for your kindness?"
11.title: Kung Fu Rescue!

choices: The wife of a footballer, who is secretly selling his secrets to the press
The secretary of a bank, stealing it's money
A golddigger
114.content:
"They always want money, don't they?" The girl sighed. "OK, I suppose I owe you one, but after this, I expect you to accept the consequences of being greedy, you get me?"

You nod, and then black out. When you wake up, you see that you are...
114.title: Money. LOTS OF IT! 8D

choices: Nobody of consequence. I'm just glad you're alright.
Tell her your name.
Ask her out. She's cute!
Hey, don't I get some sort of reward for this?
Walk away. Who needs her, anyway?
12.content:
You smash your fist into Ugly (the other one)'s face. He's clearly not expecting the assault, and can't get his knife up in time to protect from a knee to his groin. His eyes roll up into his head and he begins to convulse on the ground, foaming at the mouth. Poor guy.

Ugly starts to run at you, but the girl is swifter than he is. Her purse hits him like a ton of bricks and he falls into a crumpled heap.

"Thank you," she says. "Who are you, anyway?"
12.title: (backup) I don't know kung fu!

choices: It's your lucky day, you met a good witch
Sadly, you've just been cursed by an evil witch
Other
121.content:
"Nobody of consequence. I'm just glad you're alright."

The girl bowed in gratitude.

"Well, I won't pry if you don't want me too, but I must thank you again. You've helped me in so many ways. More than you know, in fact."

You scratched the back of your head a laughed a little. Even a person as chivalrous as you enjoyed a good ego stroking.

"It would have been criminal of me to let someone as cute as you get mugged like that. Where are you headed anyway? Maybe I can escort you until you're in a safer area."

The girl reached into her purse.

"That is very generous of you, but I think I will be alright. One thing you can help me with though, is this."

Out from her purse, she pulled out a clear orb made of some kind of glassy material. It looked rather valuable.

"Wow what is that?"

She approached you and put it in your hands.
121.title: Nobody of consequence. I'm just glad you...

choices: You try to find information on this
Go about your business
Other
1211.content:
"This orb can only be used on the virtuous. It will grant them a body fitting of their heart."

As soon as she said this, you were surrounded by glowing symbols that you couldn't identify. They swirled around you, gaining speed, until they blurred into streaks. Everything in the distance was sheathed in darkness, and this strange veil then began to come closer, eventually removing everything but the symbols from your vision. You heard a voice as it began to chant, and then suddenly the process ended.

Everything was back to normal, save for the fact that the girl had vanished.

"Hello? Is anyone here?"

No answer. You looked down at yourself, everything was normal and you certainly didn't feel any different.

"What just happened?"
1211.title: It's your lucky day, you met a good witch

choices: A crackling sound, as if from an energy surge
The lady again. She's a real trouble magnet!
12111.content: You stare down at yourself one more time, to see if anything really is different, when you realize that you are clutching the orb of blown glass that the woman gave you. You tend to think of her as a "witch", but that seems almost mean. You settle upon the name "Glinda" -- it's about as far as you can get from the term "witch". Glinda gave you this thing and said something about your body matching your heart. What do you think that means? You grapple with your thoughts before shrugging and continuing, still pondering what she said. As you walk towards your house, you suddenly hear...
12111.title: What just happened here?

choices: The orb glows green
The orb wiggles a bit, then simply stops moving.
121112.content: A high-pitched scream rent the air, and you whirl, dashing off to help her. Clenching your hand that holds the orb into an awkward fist, you swing it at the lady's would-be attacker. Fortunately, it's just the bruised and beaten thug from before, who'd woken up from the lady's vicious purse attack. You hit him, hard, in the nose and he collapses. The lady thanks you, gratitude and admiration in her eyes. Suddenly, you feel a shuddering in your hand. As you watch...
121112.title: The lady again. She's a real trouble magnet!

choices: Do you change shape?
Do things just seem to happen?
1211121.content:
To your shock and eminent surprise, the orb is glowing mysteriously. A voice springs into your mind.

"I am the witch you have saved twice. Yes, I am a witch, I do freely admit, and not usually one of those nice ones that help people, either. I would have killed the two with my spells, but you intervened and quite possible saved their lives. Even caught up in your own confusion, you saved me a second time. For this, I am in your debt, and you will feel my kindnesses for a while to come. Oh, come on now, did you really think I was going to simply not kill you like some of those other nasty types? You'll feel my presence in the days to come, that's for certain. For now, I bid you adieu."

With that, the glow fades, and so does the lady. Putting the orb into your pocket, you wander off towards your house, trying not to appear too excited. This is a truly wondrous event! But, what to do now?
1211121.title: The orb glows green

choices: The breeze is you poking out from underneath the covers.
The breeze is from your open window, waking you up just in time.
12111211.content:
Once you're home, you collapse onto the bed. What a day! You still can't really comprehend the sorts of things that have just happened to you. You helped a witch? Unreal!

With that thought, you drift off to sleep.

Your dream is a strange one. Letters fill your field of vision, and though you can't really read them well, you can just make out what they read. One word repeats itself -- Curse.

In the morning, you feel a fresh breeze.
12111211.title: Shifted.

choices: The breeze finds its way to your tub.
A strange green glow illuminates a wall of gentle steam.
121112111.content:
The world revolves around you, and you're groggy from oversleeping, so you get into your large master bathroom to wash up.

Your bathroom is huge in comparison to most. The old couple before you had a small pool in place of a bathtub, and they couldn't get it out for the moving, so they left it there as a welcoming gift for a young man. Slipping into the steamy bath, you soak in soap for a grateful ten minutes. Closing your eyes, you spontaneously remember your strange dream.

Smiling sleepily to yourself, you whisper the word from the dream.

"Curse."
121112111.title: Wakey wakey!

choices: No clothes!
You can find something to wear.
1211121112.content:
The world glows a weird green shade, and you are jolted suddenly awake. You hear your heartbeat pounding, oddly amplified in a way you don't understand. Breathing calmly still, your emotions and thoughts are in turmoil. You aren't in control of yourself!

You feel the water begin to slowly recede, but you are powerless to stop it from leaving. You can't see a thing through the strange mist. Oddly enough, the water stops draining when it is at your waist, though you're standing up during your bath. The glow -- thank goodness -- is beginning to fade, and you can finally see what has happened.

The water hasn't drained.

Looking down, you see that the bath-pool is still full of hot water. You, however, are half in, half out of the soapy mix. Your abdominal muscles are cut deeply into your stomach, and your chest muscles are broad and strong-looking. Your arms are powerful and stick into the water, but you can see that they're perfectly proportioned, muscular and tough. Feeling your face with a massive palm, you feel an angular chin and last night's stubble sitting on a broad and strong neck. Getting out of the water, you look down to see perfectly set legs, lean and thick, ending in large feet. Your thing is also big, but you've never really thought much about it and didn't do so this time. Why bother obsessing over something God gave you? Still, you acknowledge its growth with a nod and a little pat. Walking over to the mirror, you flex your new, giant muscles and smile broadly, revealing white, beautiful teeth centered straight beneath your nose.
1211121112.title: A strange green glow

choices: "You are now the care taker of my next body."
"You are now mine."
Other
1212.content:
"This?"

She said?

"It's is an orb of reconstruction."

Strange symbols flew out of the orb and surrounded you. You tried to swat them away, but your hands just passed through them. The entire world faded to black, and all you could see were the swirling symbols.

"What is going on?"

This experience was completely alien for you. You didn't even know if she was helping or harming you, but the answer would come soon enough. A strange sound like chanting began to echo all around, and then you everything returned to normal. The girl was still in front of you, and so was the orb, resting in your hands.
1212.title: Sadly, you've just been cursed by an evil w...

choices: "They have only forgotten the real you, they will recognize the current you."
"Come with me."
12121.content:
"You are now the care taker of my next body. We witches strive to be immortal, but a body will only last so long."

The idea was so strange that you weren't even sure that you heard her correctly.

"I'm sorry, could you..."

You stopped as you heard the girl's voice and thought she was speaking, but then you realized that she never opened he lips.

"Was that, me?"

Indeed it was. You looked down, and past the long flowing hair that fell around your face, you saw the clothing that the girl was wearing, only it was on you. You stepped back and brought your hands to your face. They were just like her's, small and slender. You patted your body, and it felt entirely foreign.

"What did you do to me?"

The witch snickered.

"Like I said, that body of yours is mine. I will take it once this one starts to malfunction. In reality, it is over one hundred years old. It simply doesn't age in appearance."

You walked right up to her face.

"I refuse to help you. Change me back at once!"

She took the orb from you.

"You can refuse if you want to, that is what the curse is for."

"Curse?"

You said in a frightful tone.

"Yes, anyone who sees you will forget that you ever existed. And, if you try to tell anyone about me, you will become tired, perhaps even falling asleep."

Needless to say, you were in quite a situation. Panic was knocking, but you knew that it was best to have a cool head. For now you would have to play along.

"If no one remembers me, where will I stay?"
12121.title: "You are now the care taker of my next body...

choices: She curses you to have terrible luck

She turns you into something else
She curses you to do what anyone tells you to
Other
13.content:
Hearing the voice you look over and see her, you stare for a second and she makes eye contact with you, but there's nothing you can do, you aren't a fighter. So you turn and quickly walk away. Fortunately, you don't hear any gun shots so she may be alright. When you're almost at work you feel the need to walk into an alley. After walking about ten feet down it, you start to wonder why you did it. As you are thinking, the girl from before appears in front of you.

"Why didn't you do anything? I was being mugged." She asks.

"Umm..." You answer, "I didn't think I could do anything... but you're okay, that's good."

"No thanks to you." She answers, "In fact, if I was normal I definitely wouldn't be."

"What do you mean, 'if you were normal?'" You begin to step back from her.

"You're about to find out."

You feel a brush on your shoulders as your black hair grows into long and luscious locks. Your height decreases from 5' 11" to a meager 5' 2". Your skin becomes silky smooth gaining a different skin tone. Your arms and legs becomes more petite and skinner as you feel softer more feminine features overcome your face.

"Might as well get the hard part done," the witch comments as you feel a painful inward motion on your gentials. "Now for the fun part."

Your dress shoes become light pink high heels giving you a couple inches of height. Your black slacks become skin tight blue jeans. Your suit jacket morphs off of your and becomes a white purse and your dress shirt shrinks into a baggy crop top. The tie slithers down a sleeve to become a matching bra to your former briefs now panties.

"Hmm... Something's missing. How about some womanly curves?" the soceress exclaims. Fat begins to strain against the tight confines of your new jeans forming a beautiful as that any man could get behind. Your waist shrinks in slightly to help define the bottom half of your new hourglass figure. Your nipple become sensitive and two mounds of flesh expand on your chest to fill your bra and strain the once baggy crop top. As one final touch to complete perfection, light make up appears on your face and a Starbucks coffee cup materializes in your hand.

"How does it feel to be mugged of something so precious to you? Now you can live your life with an excuse to being the coward you are," the woman snarls as she disappears from your sight.

What do you do now?

134.content: She pulls outs a wooden stick that seems to glow. "What are you doing?!?" you say as you panic. You try to run but she points the stick at you and a ray of light shoots out of it and engulfs you. You struggle as you are suspended in the air. The lady comes over to you and is holding what seems to be a collar. It looks really high tech like something out of a movie. She clasps it onto your neck and it seems to fit perfectly. She giggles and stops pointing the stick at you. You land on the ground and start to freak out. You yank at the collar but it doesn't budge. "Take this off" you say to the lady. She only giggles and says," this is your punishment for not helping me. Since you didn't help me you will get to repay the favor by being my slave and doing whatever it is I ask." "yeah right" you say and you take off running. You'll worry about the collar later. You run out of the alley but suddenly you are shocked with excruciating pain. You are stunned and on the ground, gasping for air. "Are we going to do this the easy way or the hard way?" she says as she stands over you menacingly.
134.title: She curses you to do be her slave

info.brief_description: She really did mean what she said...
info.description:
Cursed is a small interactive story about a guy who is cursed by a witch in disguise. Virtually anything can happen as a result of the curse.

Examples I'll give are physical changing, bad luck, and ethereal revenge.

Of course, you can also be bewitched. It all depends on what you do at the beginning of the narrative. Helping the witch will result in physical changing, good luck, or ethereal kindness. There are more options for both categories, but putting them here is not my idea of a good time. So, I'll let you figure out what happens next...

Now, use real English and keep the storyline relevant. This story is about the unnamed hero, in a word "You", not Jane the Housekeeper who, oddly enough, is the spectator to an unusual event. No. We have enough of that in other stories, thank you very much.

That's all -- Write on!
